svg.text: LVS-100 Validation to LVS-250 Production Roadmap
VALIDATION PATH: LVS-100 Risk Reduction â†’ LVS-250 Production
1 NPU + ARM CPU + VDSP + tRoot HSM
IP validation, architecture de-risk, software bring-up
NPU (64kMACs) + 8-core ARM64 + Quad-core VDSP + tRoot HSM
Neural Compute Engine + Secure Interface + RF Modem + Beamformer + MRAM Memory
Volume production, customer delivery, commercial deployment
- Final design rule check before foundry submission (no changes after)
